name: Kevin Runner: Endless Rush
description:
Join Kevin and run 🏃‍♂️ through the amazing world in endless rush. Finish with the longest distance to get a high score! Play now the new free runner game for everyone 🕹.

Kevin Runner is an endless running mobile game where the Player is Kevin or a character of your choice. The hero is on his adventure and has to overcome difficulties in an endless rush. As you run, grab gold coins and slimes while avoiding enemies and traps. The collected slime will be useful for destroying obstacles and defeating enemies. Kevin's world of adventures is full of dangers, from spiders 🕷, prickly hedgehogs 🦔 and fast birds 🐦 to hungry plants 🌺.

Kevin Runner Features:
🟣 classic run 👣 gameplay
🟣 a variety of innovative gameplay
🟣 5+ different world themes
🟣 rich scenes and level design
🟣 12 different characters to choose
🟣 many challenging enemies 👹
🟣 fabulous animations and high definition in-game graphics
🟣 competing with global players 🌐
🟣 the game is perfect for the whole family. Kevin Runner is fun to play both for children and adults 👪

Download now: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DanielSzulc.KevinRunner
